name: Partisanen!
description:
Partisanen! is a project that recreates life of Soviet partisans during WW2 on the territory of Belarus in form of real time strategy game. The game is created in GDevelop game engine.

  • You start in June of 1941 when Germans invaded Soviet Russia
  • Destroy all German's garrisons to achieve grand victory in game
  • Keep your squad alive until 10th July of 1944 when Belarus was liberated by Red Army to achieve normal victory
  • Beware of German's antipartisan SS forces that will attack your HQ
  • Several types of mission (assassination of traitor, railroad sabotage, attack the antipartisan forces, etc.)
